Summary: Two, square pure white lights flashing, moving at uniform speed west to east. Course change to NE, then fade within one second
divs: Sighting DetailsPlease see detailed description of the event in the attachment. Photo is of aircraft towing banner, sighted the following day aprox 10:30AM and from the same location. Location of the aircraft was south of the point of observation. Unidentified object was slightly north of my location Sketch is what was seen the day before and could not be identified. At the termination of the sighting the object(s) appeared to have traveled a considerable distance. Would appreciate some feedback if similar sightings have been reported. Dick Pearson
